subject: Congratulations! Offer for Software Engineering Intern at Google
body_text:
Dear Candidate,

Congratulations! On behalf of Google, I am thrilled to extend an offer for the Software Engineering Intern position for Summer 2025.

We were impressed by your performance throughout our interview process and believe you would be a great addition to our team.

Offer Details:
- Position: Software Engineering Intern
- Location: Mountain View, CA
- Start Date: June 2, 2025
- Duration: 12 weeks
- Compensation: $60/hour + housing stipend

Please review the attached offer letter and respond within 2 weeks to confirm your acceptance.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.

We look forward to welcoming you to Google!

Best regards,
Sarah Chen
Google University Recruiting
